Trigger A creature within 30 feet attempts to Cast a Spell with the concentrate trait.

Your frigid gaze can turn a foe's blood to ice. The triggering creature must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:resolve(@actor.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)] save against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher. It then becomes temporarily immune for 24 hours.

Critical Failure The triggering spell is disrupted.
